mapper.select: SELECT i.item_id, i.item_name, i.description, isz.size, isz.stock, isz.price, isz.size_id FROM inventory i LEFT JOIN inventory_sizes isz ON i.item_id = isz.item_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO inventory_sizes (item_id, size, price, stock, on_sale) VALUES (#{itemId}, #{size}, #{price}, #{stockQuantity}, #{onSale})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM inventory_sizes WHERE item_id = #{id} AND size_id = #{sizeId};
